data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Gojko Cimirot (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Lotto Park.
Abdoul Tapsoba is replacing Maxime Lestienne for Liege at Lotto Park.
In the minute 72, Yari Verschaeren is replacing Michel Vlap for the home team.
Francis Amuzu is on a sub for Paul Mukairu for Anderlecht.
Liege make their second substitution with Obbi Oulare replacing Michel Ange Balikwisha.
In the minute 78, Noe Dussenne is booked for the away team.
Megrim Vojvoda (Liege) has replaced the possibly injured Noe Dussenne at Lotto Park.
Lukas Nmecha (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
In the minute 83, Joshua Cullen (Anderlecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Obbi Oulare (Liege) gets a yellow card.
The home team has substituted Lukas Nmecha with Nany Dimata. Vincent Kompany is thus making his third change.
